attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: A label indicating the name of the city facility.

A label indicating the type of city facility. Values are derived from the CitySites feature class. Possible values: Animal Barn, Athletic Field/Court, Bridge, Bus Shelter, Chapel/Gazebo/Pavilion, Concessions/Restrooms/Ticket Booth, Dugout, Entertainment/Cultural/Sporting Venue, Fire Station, Golf Course, Grounds, House, Library, Marina, Museum, Non-City Building, Office and Administrative, Open Space, Operations Building, Other, Parking Deck, Parking/Roadway, Parkland, Playground, Police Station, Pool House, Public Safety Building, Recreation Center, Shelter, Storage, Swimming Pool, Tennis Center, Unknown, Water/Sewer Tank, Lift Station/Pumping Station, Trail/Greenway, ROW
A label indicating the address of the city facility.
Subjective classification defining whether or not a facility is considered a major city asset. Possible values: YES, NO.
A classification designating the type of facility of the parent. Values are derived from the CitySites feature class.
The business hours of the city facility.
The URL of the website associated with the city facility if one exists.

distFormat.formatVer: OPTIONAL: Provide the distribution format version for the data.

idCitation.resTitle: City of Greensboro Facilities, Greensboro NC, NAD83 North Carolina State Plane, City of Greensboro GIS Division 2015 [CityFacilities]

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This is a GIS dataset consisting of points depicting the location of all current City of Greensboro Facilities. Coverage is for the City of Greensboro city limits.

themeKeys.keyword: City Facilities, Athletic Field, Entertainment Venue, Cultural Venue, Sporting Venue, Fire Station, Golf Course, Library, Marina, Museum, Operations Building, Parking Deck, Park, Playground, Police Station, Recreation Center, Shelter, Tennis Center, City of Greensboro, North Carolina

Consts.useLimit: The City of Greensboro shall not be held liable for any errors in these data. This includes errors of omission, commission, errors concerning the content of the data, and relative and positional accuracy of the data. These data cannot be construed to be a legal document.

prcStep.stepDesc: A list of city facility names was obtained from the City's Facility Division. Point features were pysically placed for each facility.

CovDesc.attDesc: AutoLabel - A label indicating the name of the city facility.

AssetClass - A label indicating the type of city facility. Values are derived from the CitySites feature class. Possible values: Animal Barn, Athletic Field/Court, Bridge, Bus Shelter, Chapel/Gazebo/Pavilion, Concessions/Restrooms/Ticket Booth, Dugout, Entertainment/Cultural/Sporting Venue, Fire Station, Golf Course, Grounds, House, Library, Marina, Museum, Non-City Building, Office and Administrative, Open Space, Operations Building, Other, Parking Deck, Parking/Roadway, Parkland, Playground, Police Station, Pool House, Public Safety Building, Recreation Center, Shelter, Storage, Swimming Pool, Tennis Center, Unknown, Water/Sewer Tank, Lift Station/Pumping Station, Trail/Greenway, ROW
Address - A label indicating the address of the city facility.
MajorAsset – Subjective classification defining whether or not a facility is considered a major city asset. Possible values: YES, NO.
ParentSiteName – Designates the parent site of the city facility if one exists. Values are derived from the CitySites feature class.
ParentType - A classification designating the type of facility of the parent. Values are derived from the CitySites feature class.
SiteContact - Not populated. Intended to hold a contact name for a staff member that can answer questions about the facility.
PhoneNumber - The contact phone number for the city facility.
SiteHours - The business hours of the city facility.
WebSite - The URL of the website associated with the city facility if one exists.
SiteEmail – Not populated. Intended to hold a contact email for a staff member that can answer questions about the facility.
ShowOnWeb – Designates whether the facility is considered critical infrastructure, and should be displayed in City website viewers. Possible values: YES, NO.
